entry.title: Regression Testing: Drawing Lines in the Sand

link.title: Regression Testing: Drawing Lines in the Sand

entry.content: I had a legacy project at work that I took over a few years agoâ€¦
entry.summary: Every time my team touched the code, we ran the risk of changing important output results -- without even knowing it.
